extracted_playbook.title: Download and Install Drive Composer Version 2.9.1
extracted_playbook.description: Download and install Drive Composer Version 2.9.1 (both entry and pro) from the product page to correct the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Isolate Special Purpose Networks
extracted_playbook.description: Isolate special purpose networks (e.g., for automation systems) and remote devices behind firewalls and separate them from any general-purpose network (e.g., office or home networks).

extracted_playbook.title: Install Physical Access Controls
extracted_playbook.description: Install physical controls to prevent unauthorized personnel from accessing devices, components, peripheral equipment, and networks.

extracted_playbook.title: Restrict Network Connections for Programming Software
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure programming software or computers containing programming software are only connected to the intended network for the devices.

extracted_playbook.title: Scan Imported Data for Malware
extracted_playbook.description: Scan all data imported into your environment before use to detect potential malware infections.

extracted_playbook.title: Minimize Network Exposure
extracted_playbook.description: Minimize network exposure for all applications and endpoints to ensure they are not accessible from the Internet unless necessary.

extracted_playbook.title: Ensure Up-to-Date Software and Security Measures
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure all nodes are up to date with installed software, operating system, firmware patches, anti-virus, and firewall.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Secure Remote Access Methods
extracted_playbook.description: When remote access is required, use secure methods such as VPNs. Ensure VPNs are updated to the most current version available.

extracted_playbook.title: Perform Impact Analysis and Risk Assessment
extracted_playbook.description: Perform proper impact analysis and risk assessment prior to deploying defensive measures as recommended by CISA.

extracted_playbook.title: Report Suspected Malicious Activity to CISA
extracted_playbook.description: Follow established internal procedures to report suspected malicious activity to CISA for tracking and correlation against other incidents.
